member.name: WinRT.CreateControlInput
member.summary: Creates a ICoreInputSourceBase object in the caller’s UI thread.
member.param: Interface ID of the object. Must to be set to the UUID for ICoreInputSourceBase, which is 9F488807-4580-4BE8-BE68-92A9311713BB.
Pointer to receive the ICoreInputSourceBase object.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: WinRT.CreateControlInputEx
member.summary: Creates a ICoreInputSourceBase object in a worker thread or the UI thread.
member.param: Pointer to the parent CoreWindow to which the ICoreInputSourceBase object will be attached. This parameter can’t be NULL.
Interface ID of the object. Must to be set to the UUID for ICoreInputSourceBase, which is 9F488807-4580-4BE8-BE68-92A9311713BB.
Pointer to receive the ICoreInputSourceBase object.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
